page.title: 07Farm Machinery
page.content: Production on the farm has greatly increased due to the advanced machinery now used.At{Charity Farm}we saw Case, County, John Deere, Hesston and International and tractors. They are far larger than the older types and have enclosed cabins, more power, larger wheels and many more scientific agricultural attachments. The combine harvester was the most impressive piece of machinery. The wheels were higher than our teacher is tall and two children could fit inside the wheel hub. The eight-wheeled tractor was enormous. Some farmers had kept 1948 model tractors as a reminder of harder times. We also saw tankers which contain spray, rape swathers, dressers and gigantic fans working a cooling system for the grain. The most important machinery on the dairy farm was the milking machine.
